# Portfolio Platform - Project Documentation

## Project Overview

A GitHub-imported portfolio template platform built in Replit where users can:
- Browse and preview 6 different portfolio templates
- Use an interactive portfolio builder to create custom portfolios
- Fill in their personal details (title, services, projects, contacts, social media)
- Store portfolios in Supabase database with unique slug-based URLs
- Share their portfolios publicly (e.g., `/portfolio/username`)

## Current Status

‚úÖ **Complete MVP Implementation**
- Template browsing system with 6 distinct designs
- Full-featured portfolio builder with form validation
- Neo-Brutalist Minimalist template with animations
- Supabase database integration
- Slug-based routing for public portfolios
- URL availability checking
- Portfolio save and retrieve functionality

## Design Aesthetics

### Neo-Brutalist Minimalist (Template 1)
- **Background**: White (#FFFFFF)
- **Text**: Black (#000000)
- **Accent**: Spring Green (#00DC82)
- **Shadows**: Hard, offset shadows (4-6px) for depth
- **Typography**: Clean, modern sans-serif fonts
- **Animations**: Smooth transitions and scroll effects via Framer Motion

### Cyberpunk DevFolio (Template 2 - NEW)
- **Background**: Deep Void Black (#050505) / Midnight Blue (#0a0a12)
- **Primary Text**: Off-white/Silver (#e2e8f0)
- **Accents**: Neon Cyan (#00f3ff), Neon Purple (#bc13fe), Matrix Green (#0aff0a)
- **Typography**: Orbitron (headings), JetBrains Mono (body/code)
- **Visual Effects**:
  - Glassmorphism panels with backdrop blur
  - Scanline overlay effects (CRT monitor style)
  - Terminal-style typing animations
  - Glitch effects on hover
  - Neon glow borders and text shadows
  - Particle network background animation
- **Sections**:
  - HUD Navigation with bracket hover animations
  - Terminal-style Hero with typing effect
  - System Specs About section with skill bars
  - Holographic Service cards with 3D hover
  - Repository-style Project grid with scanlines
  - Knowledge Base FAQ (code documentation style)
  - Command-line Contact form

## Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: React 19.2 with TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom animations
- **Animation**: Framer Motion
- **Backend Database**: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- **Build Tool**: Vite 6.2
- **UI Icons**: Lucide React
- **3D Graphics**: Three.js (optional, installed)

## Key Features Implemented

### 1. Template System
- 6 distinct portfolio template designs
- Interactive preview with demo data
- Template switching and comparison
- Responsive design for all templates

### 2. Portfolio Builder
- Multi-tab form interface:
  - **Basic Info**: Title, subtitle, about, contact details, profile image
  - **Services**: Add/remove services with icons
  - **Projects**: Add/remove portfolio projects with images and links
  - **Social Media**: Add social profile links
- Real-time form validation
- Image upload capability
- Form state management

### 3. Supabase Integration
- Secure database connection
- Portfolio CRUD operations:
  - **Create**: Save new portfolio (upsert)
  - **Read**: Fetch portfolio by slug
  - **Update**: Modify existing portfolio
- Slug availability checking
- Row-level security policies for public access

### 4. URL Routing
- Slug-based portfolio URLs: `/portfolio/username`
- Automatic URL detection on page load
- Slug validation and formatting (lowercase, no special chars)
- Duplicate slug prevention

### 5. Portfolio Display
- Public portfolio viewer at `/portfolio/[slug]`
- Responsive layout on all devices
- All portfolio data displayed beautifully
- Navigation and smooth scrolling

## Known Limitations & Future Enhancements

### Current Limitations
- No user authentication (future feature)
- Portfolio editing requires re-saving entire portfolio
- Image storage via URLs only (no direct upload to storage)
- Single template per portfolio (switching requires creating new)

### Planned Enhancements
1. User authentication and account management
2. Portfolio analytics and visitor tracking
3. Custom domain support
4. Portfolio version history
5. Direct image upload to cloud storage
6. Template switching without recreating
7. Export portfolio as PDF
8. Blog integration
9. Comment/feedback system
10. Portfolio customization (colors, fonts, layout)

## Deployment

To deploy this project:
1. Click "Publish" in Replit
2. Configure as static site or autoscale
3. Database is automatically configured via Supabase
4. Environment variables are set in Replit secrets
5. Domain will be provided by Replit

## Testing Checklist

- [ ] Template preview loads correctly
- [ ] Portfolio builder form accepts all inputs
- [ ] Image upload works
- [ ] Slug availability checking works
- [ ] Portfolio saves to database
- [ ] Public portfolio page loads correctly
- [ ] Responsive design on mobile/tablet/desktop
- [ ] All animations work smoothly
- [ ] Social media links work
- [ ] Contact info displays correctly

## Troubleshooting

### Supabase Connection Issues
- Verify `.env.local` has correct credentials
- Check Supabase project is active
- Ensure network connectivity
- Check browser console for specific errors

### Portfolio Not Saving
- Verify all required fields are filled
- Check slug is available (click Check)
- Ensure Supabase connection is working
- Try refreshing page and retrying

### Images Not Loading
- Verify image URLs are accessible
- Check image CORS settings
- Try different image format (JPG vs PNG)
- Verify file size under 2MB

## User Preferences

- Design aesthetic: Neo-Brutalist Minimalist (clean, modern)
- Color scheme: High contrast (white/black/spring green)
- Animation style: Smooth, purposeful animations (not excessive)
- Content focus: Professional portfolio functionality
- Accessibility: Clean, readable typography

## Support & Contact

For issues or questions, refer to SETUP_GUIDE.md or contact development team.
